examples.comment_3: Remove watermarks which were found in the document

steps.title: Programmatically Remove Watermarks from {{FileformatCap}} Documents using {{EnvName}}

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** empowers {{EnvName}} developers to programmatically remove watermarks from various {{FileformatCap}} documents. This guide outlines the process:
content.step_1: Initiate the workflow by supplying your {{FileformatCap}} file as an argument to the **Watermarker** class constructor. The file can be provided as either a byte stream, a file stream, or a reference to a local disk location.
content.step_2: Leverage the power of the **SearchCriteria** object to identify the specific watermarks requiring removal. This object enables the filtering of watermarks based on properties previously embedded within the document. You can utilize an image as a search parameter alongside text or formatting attributes for a highly granular search.
content.step_3: Following a successful search, you'll receive a collection of relevant watermarks. These watermarks offer granular control, allowing you to perform the removal operation.
content.step_4: Upon completion of watermark removal, persist the modified document. The API facilitates storage using either a local file path or a stream object.

more_features.title: Deep dive into adding Watermark
more_features.description: API to render, display, convert documents, slides, diagrams, and many other document types in .NET applications

feature_1.title: Watermark your documents easily.
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to add various types of watermarks in popular business documents and files.

feature_2.title: Customize watermarks for your goals.
feature_2.content: Our solution supports many watermark features. You can easily adjust size, rotation, color, font, font styles and other options to make watermark looks perfect.

feature_3.title: Use native document objects
feature_3.content: Accordingly do particular document format it is possible to use native document features. Native PDF annotations or MS Word page watermark may be used for watermarking.

code_1.title: Presentation background watermark remove
code_1.content: This example shows how to remove the background image of a particular slide.

head.title: Remove DOC Document Watermark
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} allows to generate Word Document watermarks in {{EnvName}}, J2SE 7.0 (1.7) or above applications.

header.title: Remove Watermark for Document of MS Word formats with {{EnvName}}
header.description: Text and image watermark generation for MS Excel files using {{EnvName}} J2SE applications. Watermarks your business documents with BMP, PNG, GIF, and JPEG images or text. Adjust watermark size, alignment, rotation angle, and position on the document pages.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} is designed for generation various Word watermarks using {{EnvName}}. Our solution may enrich {{EnvName}} apps by performing generation, adjusting, search, and clearing various watermarks in Word documents. {{ProdShortName}} available for many operating systems and {{EnvName}} J2SE 7.0 (1.7), J2SE 8.0 (1.8) or above.

formats.title: MS Word documents watermarking via {{ProgLang}}
formats.description: Protect MS Word business documents with image or text watermarks. Involve {{ProdFullName}} API to your business processes.
